Mendokusai

Tartarus

Whining

24 Nov 2018

Somedays, you just need to have a good whine, and today is one of those days.

My wrists hurt, my gym session today felt lethargic and weak and I think I hurt my shoulder, driving to and from the gym was as frustrating and terrifying as ever, I feel like I've eaten too much the past two days, I have done virtually nothing productive today, I haven't made any real effort to talk to anyone today even though I wanted to do, I have felt super anxious all day, and I'm exhausted.

Time to go to bed and try again tomorrow.
